title: Preparing to Rage (feat. Mike Feeney & Brendan Sagalow)
description:
Brendan Sagalow & Mike Feeney join The Bonfire as the prepare with Jay & Dan to see Rage Against the Machine at Madison Square Garden after the show.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
